scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana - Short Term Training
description: The Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY) - Short Term Training (STT) component provides skill training to Indian nationals who are school/college dropouts or unemployed. It offers training aligned with the National Skills Qualification Framework (NSQF), including soft skills, entrepreneurship, financial and digital literacy, with placement assistance. The scheme supports both fresh skilling and reskilling, and aims to enhance employability domestically and internationally through additional modules and bridge courses. It is implemented under both Central and State components, with training duration varying by job role, and also promotes fee-based higher-level skill courses while supporting marginalized sections.
benefits: Counselling through District-level skill information centre
Training in Soft Skills, Entrepreneurship, Financial and Digital Literacy
Accidental Insurance (Kaushal Bima) of Rs. 2 lakhs for three years
One-time incentive to all certified candidates
Post Training Support including add-on bridge courses and language courses for international compatibility
eligibility: Candidate must be of Indian nationality
Possesses an Aadhaar card and an Aadhaar linked bank account
Fulfils other criteria for the respective job role as defined by the awarding body
documents: Documents as required for the specific job role
